name: **Goat Island (Beg)**
description: Goat Island (Beg) V888-269 Sheet 88 The smaller Goat Island is extremely difficult to land on. It has a white conical marker on its seaward, southerly tip. A deep-water landing may be had in the channel with a most exposed scramble up a ramp on a slab of rock. Alternatively, perhaps on a very good day, landing may be made elsewhere. Beware the West side of the channel between the two Goats in any sort of bounce.
